mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_PRODUCT_TYPE WHERE TYPE_SN REGEXP CONCAT('^', #{typeSn}, '_[0-9]+$')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( PRDCT_SN , TYPE_SN , PRDCT_NM , PRDCT_DTLS , PRDCT_PRCS , PRDCT_STK , DISC_AMNT , DISC_PER , USE_YN , REG_DT , REG_ID ) SELECT IFNULL(MAX_PRDCT_SN, 0) + 1 , #{param[category3]} , #{param[name]} , #{param[detail]} , #{param[price]} , #{param[inventory]} , IF(#{param[discountType]} = '0', #{param[discount]}, 0) AS DISC_AMNT , IF(#{param[discountType]} = '1', #{param[discount]}, 0) AS DISC_PER , "Y" , sysdate() , #{userId} FROM (SELECT MAX(PRDCT_SN) AS MAX_PRDCT_SN FROM TB_PRODUCT) AS subquery
